remarks: Lemma for decidability and ordinals.  The set ` { x e. { (/) } | ph } ` is a way of connecting statements about ordinals (such as trichotomy in ~ ordtriexmid or weak linearity in ~ ordsoexmid ) with a proposition ` ph ` .  Our lemma helps connect that set to excluded middle. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 28-Jan-2019.)
statement:
ordtriexmidlem2 $p |- ( { x e. { (/) } | ph } = (/) -> -. ph ) $.
$d ph x $.
